title: Blended Learning-Based LIS Knowledge Management Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information science theories and workplace knowledge-sharing experience
context.additional_context: Parallel implementation of wiki-based collaborative activities in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain core concepts in the LIS field (metadata, knowledge classification systems, etc.) with over 85% accuracy through wiki-based activities.
Learners can collaborate with peers in a blended learning environment to write discussion documents on the knowledge management system design process.
Through collaborative knowledge building using wikis, learners can propose at least two information organization strategies applicable to the workplace.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
